rule: The output must begin with the phrase "Company names:" followed by a comma-separated list of company names extracted from the text.
input: Microsoft Corporation has been in talks with Google to enhance AI capabilities. Satya Nadella and Sundar Pichai discussed future collaborations.
evaluation:
- Companies involved: Microsoft Corporation, Google
- Individuals mentioned: Satya Nadella, Sundar Pichai
- Topic: Enhance AI capabilities, future collaborations
